abstract: Susanne Craig looks at Warren E. Buffett’s decision to invest $5 billion in Bank of America, a vote of confidence for the beleaguered financial firm.
snippet: Susanne Craig looks at Warren E. Buffett’s decision to invest $5 billion in Bank of America, a vote of confidence for the beleaguered financial firm.
lead_paragraph: Susanne Craig looks at Warren E. Buffett’s decision to invest $5 billion in Bank of America, a vote of confidence for the beleaguered financial firm.

byline.original: By Susanne Craig and Erik Olsen
